text: The 1924 Argentine Primera División was the 33rd season of top-flight football in Argentina. The AFA season began on April 13 and ended on January 4, 1925; while the AAmF began on April 6 and ended on February 15, 1925.Argentina 1924 by Osvaldo Gorgazzi at RSSSF.com ==Final tables== ===Asociación Argentina de Football - Copa Campeonato=== Club Atlético Sportsman made its debut in Primera División. ===Asociación Amateur de Football=== Club Atlético Liberal Argentino made its debut in Primera División.Argentina 1924 at RSSSF ==References== Category:Argentine Primera División seasons Category:1924 in Argentine football Category:1924 in South American football
title: 1924 Argentine Primera División
